channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: My Life
channel.desc: Meet Jazzy - she?s just 15 years old, but already an MMA star. Her biggest dream? To win the World Youth Championships for Team England. Jazzy?s adventure takes her all the way to the glittering city of Abu Dhabi, where the best young athletes from around the globe gather to battle it out. The competition is fierce, and every match will test her strength, courage and heart. But Jazzy isn?t just any competitor. MMA has helped her tackle the challenges of Tourette syndrome, and now she?s ready to show the world what she?s made of. Join Jazzy on her action-packed journey through tough training, nail-biting matches, and the thrill of representing her country. Will she rise to the top and make her dream of becoming the best in the world come true.
